narrative.narrative: Skippers Aviation was founded in 1990 and operates out of Perth in Western Australia. They bill themselves as Western Australia's Truly Regional Airline. All 7 of their scheduled service is to Western Australian airports. It also operates service to 15 mines and has 100 flights a week on a regular basis to these mines. It's fleet has 27 planes. Six EMB 120ER's, six Dash 8 300's, four Dash 8 100's, two Fokker 100's, five Fairchild Metroliners, and four Cessna 441 Conquest II's.
